storyInfo: Be it fantasies or ideals, if we never chased the things we once believed in, would we have made it to where we are today? Perhaps we were once naive, but one need not regret naivety.

attributes.content: The town feels so lively today. is it because the conference is about to start?
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Maybe. There are explosions everywhere. Everyone's so excited.
attributes.name: Relaxed Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Hey, what the hell?!
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Is that... an executor... and a Legatus?!
attributes.name: Relaxed Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: What's going on? A parkour competition?
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: That sounds like fun! Why don't you join in?
attributes.name: Relaxed Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Let's go! See if we can catch up with them!
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: This should be far enough...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You're a stubborn one, aren't you, Federico?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: As are you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I thought you didn't have a mission... Aren't you practically on vacation?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't get it. Is there a reason you can't get off my case? What did I ever do to offend you?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: My last mission was in Siracusa, to recover the personal effects of a local Sankta.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Among them was a notebook. In it, he wrote that he once saw a female Sankta come into contact with a male Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Alright, I can see why you'd look into that, but what does it have to do with me? I'm decidedly male, in case you can't tell.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I followed all the leads I had and found the Sankta woman's address: 7-265 Via Thervatius, Pagus Stevonus.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And when you made it there, you found that she'd already passed away.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That's correct.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So you had no choice but to keep following her tracks. Then you found she had been taking suspicious trips, and that she always contacted a specific Legatus before she left on her journeys...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Hahahahaha, this is good. This is very good!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And here I thought I gave myself away in Victoria or left some evidence after I talked to Andoain. Never would I have thought it was because I helped Feoria out of the goodness of my heart.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: This might just be some kind of fate.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Are you done musing?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: *Sigh*, Federico, if my hunch's correct, you probably can't feel what I'm feeling right now. Yes? No?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Yes. And I do not care.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The emotions of those I arrest are not my concern.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Does that mean you care about the feelings of anyone you're not arresting?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You and I are the same. Neither of us cares for empathy... The way I see it, we could be great friends.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Actually, I think Laterano could use more people like you.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Someone who doesn't let their empathy get to them, always doing things by the book.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't disagree. Perhaps I could pay you a visit in the penitentiary after your trial and we could discuss it more.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So, that's your reason, Oren?
Well, here comes the worst of my troubles... Why must an honest-to-God good guy like me be blessed with such rotten luck?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Good day, Cardinal Velliv.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Good day, Executor Federico.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The Seventh Tribunal will handle the traitor from this point forward. The Notarial Hall's involvement is concluded. Please send a copy of your report on this matter to both the Seventh and First Tribunals.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: This is my authorization code.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Confirmed. In accordance with all relevant regulations.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So? Would you like to go back to your vacation or join me in arresting the Astray? It's up to you.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Vel, has anyone ever heard Federico say goodbye to anyone?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You can stop trying to cozy up to me.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I thought you were here to help me.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: If you were here to arrest me, you could've waited until Federico was done, right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Of course, it's possible that he couldn't take me... but that wouldn't mean you had to send him home, right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I simply realized that you might be more useful than I expected.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: When I read Federico's report, I thought you were just Andoain's helping hand... but it looks like... you're not as much of an imbecile as I thought.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'm honored.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Cecelia's existence is a threat to Laterano. You don't want this threat to be wiped away... not because you want to see it executed, but because you want to use it to make a deal.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: It really makes my heart ache, you know? It's such a windfall, but no one's trying to touch the pile of money.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I'm the most faithful to Laterano a man can be, honestly. You know that, Velliv.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I'm His Holiness's biggest supporter. His ideals, anyway.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But you don't agree with the way he does things, correct?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Like this conference, for example. You don't think there's any point to it.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: And you think there is?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Velliv, how much do you know about Victoria these days?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You wouldn't understand just how close we are to war.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And at a time like this, His Holiness put up all the political capital he accumulated over the last couple decades... but even though he managed to get most of the countries to bend, the envoys who showed up... they hardly have any weight.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: In more peaceful times, maybe we could use this as a foundation and slowly pave our way forward.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But we don't live in peaceful times. There's no time for us to dilly-dally around if we actually want to see his ideals put into practice.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I saw a lot of even dirtier moves in Victoria, with my own eyes. I won't say it's the right way to do things, but if doing the right thing doesn't get us to the finish lineâ€”
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Tell me, would you rather be a woman of integrity?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You know, you usually aren't this talkative in situations like these.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: What are you waiting for?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Actually, I just changed my mind.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: After traveling out there for so long, I'm buying less and less into the idea that Sankta are special.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We've got the empathy thing, we feel what we feel. That's it.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What just happened, though... Even I have to admit... I felt something ancient and primal... and it originated in my heart.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Moreover, we got ourselves a trump card.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: All those envoys are gathered here in Laterano, and we are blessed with a miracle.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What does that mean? What could it mean? There is still a lot for us to do, isn't there?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I think you might be mistaken about one thing. You think there is no place for the Summit of Nations during troubled times... I suggest you look at this from the other side.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: That said, I think you have the right idea about one point. There are certain things that His Holiness can't do himself, and I also don't think there's any harm in having a backup plan.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You're a lucky man, Oren. I do have a use for you.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Come out, Patia.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: At least you still have some sense in you, and your Sarkaz friends aren't running around the city, joining in on the commotion.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If any of the envoys saw the Sarkaz actively sabotaging the Summit of Nations in Laterano... Things wouldn't end nearly as well.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What are you trying to say?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Andoain is on his way to the Basilica, isn't he?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What do you know about him?!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I've got no reason to tell you, Patia.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But before I go settle my score with him, I need you to stop the stupid, annoying little tricks.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: While your people might still have some sense in you and you aren't actually trying to sabotage the Summit of Nations...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm warning you. Don't push your luck. Things don't always go the way we want them to.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Oh? So now it's your turn to 'convince' me?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: This is just a little advice. If you don't want to take it, that's no feathers off my plumage.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta, tell me. What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: What else could I be thinking? I'm doing my job... I'm settling the score. It's not that complicated.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why did you leave the Pontifica Cohors eight years ago?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: They don't get to leave the city, only the Notarial Hall does. What's it matter? Why ask about that?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I don't know what you're brooding about. Maybe you put your hopes on me for something, but I don't really get what your whole thing about Lateran Liberi is about.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And I couldn't care less about it.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: A teammate I trusted betrayed us. One of my friends got hurt because of it, and another got exiled. There might even be traitors who have eyes on them because of it.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I made this mistake once... and I won't let it happen again.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'll protect them. It's as simple as that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And I'm not going to apologize if that doesn't fit in with your fantasies.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: ...Pfft.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Don't get cocky, Mostima. In the same position, wouldn't you do the same?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're right. I would.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's true. I've got a fantasy.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: But so what if it's a fantasy? Fantasies, ideals. If I didn't chase the things I once believed in, I wouldn't have made it this far.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Maybe I'm too naive to entrust others with my ideals, but I have no regrets.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I don't get you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: That's why I'm not going to back down. Even if everything I'm doing seems stupid and annoying to you, it's my mission, and I will see it through to the end.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: If you want to stop me, you'll have to take me down.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Very well, Patia.
attributes.name: Fiammetta
